nodes.text: Foyvè oil was a type of oil that could be used to flambée a Geniserian sand monkey. Geniserian sand monkey flambéed with foyvè oil was considered a delicacy by some individuals and was difficult to obtain. However, around 18 BBY, an Elomin named Haninum Tyk Rhinann was able to obtain the dish while on the planet Coruscant, the Galactic Empire's capital. Rhinann provided the dish to satisfy the epicurean tastes of a client of Jax Pavan, who worked as a private investigator.
Foyvè oil was first mentioned in Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves.
